text: Geoffrey Curtis Ralph "Geoff" Peddle (1 January 1963 â€“ 8 October 2020) was a Canadian Anglican prelate. He was the bishop of the Diocese of Eastern Newfoundland and Labrador from 2014 to 2020. Peddle was born in Bonavista, Newfoundland and Labrador. Peddle died on 8 October 2020 at the age of 57. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Anglican bishops Category:Anglican priests Category:People from Newfoundland and Labrador
title: Geoff Peddle
